entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.9°C

Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
